channel.title: Special game mode with both cult AND unseen
channel.description:
1 king, could not be evil 1 prince 1 MM 1 assassin 1 cult leader 1 random cult not apostle 2 neutrals, one of which is an NK 8 BD
two other options:
1) calm Because both cult and unseen will decimate the BD, the two neutrals will be BD. No NK
2) extra chaos Both neutrals are reaper and possessor
---------------
I think this would be tremendously fun

item.title: Special game mode with both cult AND unseen
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description: Read full topic
item.source: Special game mode with both cult AND unseen

item.title: Special game mode with both cult AND unseen
item.dc:creator: Ben_Pollard
item.description:
Just sit back as BD and relax as the evil factions destroy each other.
Sell their stuff.
Profit.

Read full topic
item.source: Special game mode with both cult AND unseen

item.title: Special game mode with both cult AND unseen
item.dc:creator: PandaKing
item.description:
Yeah if cult and unseen are in the game it only makes sense to have the investigator be able to investigate all scum. Suggestion call it Chaos Investigator.

Also by upping up the body count per game, Chaos modes could always be a test game in a sense of trying out new classes before going live to Casual or Ranked play.

Read full topic
item.source: Special game mode with both cult AND unseen

item.title: Special game mode with both cult AND unseen
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
I was also thinking of a super investigator, a combination of sheriff and paly, for this game mode only:

The Detective
Blue dragon Investigative
Day ability: Scout
Same as sheriff’s
Day ability: Smite
Same as paladin’s but day ability and activates following night
Night ability: Background check
Determine if your target is a member of the cult/unseen. If they are, they will be seen as “Conspirator”

Converts to Marshall and seeker
would be guaranteed to have at least one, but could have another

Read full topic
item.source: Special game mode with both cult AND unseen

item.title: Special game mode with both cult AND unseen
item.dc:creator: Ami
item.description:
Did I hear F A B O U L O U S M U T L I B A L L ?

item.title: Special game mode with both cult AND unseen
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
Okay I am changing it, 20 players now

-King (Always good)
-MM
-Assassin
-Cult leader
-random cult (not apostle)
-12 BD
-3 neutrals (cannot be NK)

Read full topic

item.title: Special game mode with both cult AND unseen
item.dc:creator: Ben_Pollard
item.description:
Well surely this would then be

BD vs Cult vs Unseen? So it wouldn’t be BD against Cult & Unseen together. Would be interesting for sure.

Read full topic
item.source: Special game mode with both cult AND unseen

item.description:
Laaaaaaame. That doesn’t even make sense!

Read full topic
item.source: Special game mode with both cult AND unseen

item.title: Special game mode with both cult AND unseen
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
Or make it sheriff can’t br converted by cult and vice versa

Read full topic
item.source: Special game mode with both cult AND unseen

item.title: Special game mode with both cult AND unseen
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Right. I was thinking you could just either give the Sheriff smite (does not bypass night immunity) or the paladin scout and giving they’re main ability the power to find both factions.

I’d go with the paladin or a new class with the Ability’s I just mentioned so we can design a converted unseen that can find factions effectively so they can maintain the fake claim by finding cult.

Read full topic
item.source: Special game mode with both cult AND unseen

item.title: Special game mode with both cult AND unseen
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
I was considering that, but it might be too powerful. Of course, it would be balanced by it being suspected of it having been converted every day after it reveals.

Read full topic
item.source: Special game mode with both cult AND unseen

item.title: Special game mode with both cult AND unseen
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Personally I would combine the sheriff and Paladin into a class that can find both.
